title: Bugsplats
body:
Hello!

I've been having troubles since the new client came out pretty much, at some point my client started getting bugsplats whenever i went into loadingscreen, repairing helped, after that the client started bugsplatting after i log in, soon after everytime i try to even open it. 
I reinstallted it countless times, used the hextech repair tool as well, nothing helped. Now I found a kind of solution I'm running it on my external harddrive, which makes the game more laggy, but hey at least i can run it at all, now my fps started to drop from 120 to 20 - 15 since the newest patch, so i thought i could give it another try, it's still bugsplatting (I mean i copied the same folder from my external harddrive to my D drive?)

y maybe anyone has any ideas why or what could be causing the problems!

replies.body: Running on an external drive can cause issues and continuous reinstall because the game is intended to be saved to your primary internal drive.  Instead, go over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help tune things up and fix up whatever is causing the client to bugsplat.
